name: Battle for Antarctica
description:
Fight your way through waves of enemy ships to claim Antarctica and its treasures! 🛥️

Made for the OpenGameArt.org's Winter Game Jam 2022

How to play

WASD - Move

The cannons of your ship will automatically rotate and fire on the closest enemy. Defeat the previous wave to progress.

Play in full screen for best experience :)

Author: Pascal Boardman (Protosev) Twitter
